leve.name: All of These Bases Belong to Us (L)
leve.description: With our knights' recent victory in claiming their first foothold in the Churning Mists, their ambition burns ever brighter to establish more bases close enough to the Dravanians' domain to monitor their activities but distant enough to remain undetected. An opportunity for employment has been extended for a survey of the lands so that we might find suitable locations for these future outposts.
leve.client: Temple Knights Second Commander Ser Handeloup
